title: Federação Alagoana de Futebol
text: The Federação Alagoana de Futebol (English: Football Association of Alagoas state) was founded on March 14, 1927, and it manages all the official <a href="association%20football">football</a> tournaments within the state of <a href="Alagoas">Alagoas</a>, which are the <a href="Campeonato%20Alagoano">Campeonato Alagoano</a> and the <a href="Campeonato%20Alagoano%20%28lower%20levels%29">Campeonato Alagoano lower levels</a>, and represents the clubs at the <a href="Brazilian%20Football%20Confederation">Brazilian Football Confederation (CBF)</a>.
